helpText.customer: This is the name of the customer that will be output in the storefront.
helpText.company: This field determines the company of the customer.
helpText.quote: In this field you can enter the review that the customer has given.
helpText.rating: This field determines the number of stars.
helpText.ratingMax: This field determines the maximum number of stars possible.
helpText.boxColor: Set the text color with this field.
helpText.boxHighlightColor: The element uses a color to highlight certain elements. Set the color here.
helpText.boxBackground: The element uses a background color depending on the theme. Set this color here.
